info.game_comments:
1991 Tournament of Champions semifinal game 1.

Clip of this game shown in the movie Groundhog Day.

(1, 1).clue: During the Exodus God provided the Israelites with this food which tasted "like wafers made with honey"

(6, 1).clue: An elated person is sometimes said to be "as happy as" this songbird

(6, 2).clue: This bird isn't biologically distinct from the pigeon, it's just smaller

(1, 3).clue: These 3 men were cast into a fiery furnace but "the fire had no power" over their bodies

(4, 4).clue: The 3 most important types of these are baseball, interlocking & overlapping
